markdownRemark.html:
I wanted to thank everyone for coming out tonight and supporting the JaxDUG group. I just posted my presentation on using ASP.NET MVC with JQuery 1.7.1. All of my powerpoint presentations are up on this site at the fekke.com/powerpoint. The presentation I did tonight can be found at the following link.

I plan on publishing the source code up in segments when I get the time. Please let me know what you thought of the presentation if you attended tonight.

frontmatter.title: Presentation on ASP.NET MVC3 and JQuery this Wednesday
SQL Saturday coming to Jacksonville, FL on Apr 28, 2012
